SEARCH
Package Patient.Controller

Class PatientController

java.lang.Object
Patient.Controller.PatientController
public class PatientController extends Object
Controller class for managing `Patient` entities and their interactions. Provides methods for retrieving, updating, and creating `Patient` objects, as well as accessing associated medical records.

  • Method Details

    • getMedicalRecords

      public static List<MedicalRecord> getMedicalRecords(Patient patient)
      Retrieves the medical records associated with a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The `Patient` object whose medical records are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of `MedicalRecord` objects for the specified patient.

    • createPatientFromUser

      public static Patient createPatientFromUser(User user)
      Creates a `Patient` object from a given `User` object. Associates the `Patient` with the provided `User`.
      Parameters:
      user - The `User` object to create the `Patient` object from.
      Returns:
      The created `Patient` object, or `null` if no patient is found in the repository.

    • updatePatient

      public static Patient updatePatient(Patient patient)
      Updates the details of a specific `Patient` in the repository.
      Parameters:
      patient - The `Patient` object with updated details.
      Returns:
      The updated `Patient` object after saving changes to the repository.

    • getPatientById

      public static Patient getPatientById(String patientId)
      Retrieves a `Patient` object by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The unique ID of the patient.
      Returns:
      The `Patient` object corresponding to the given ID, or `null` if not found.
